profile.description:
I am a committed, communicative person eager to grow. I am passionate about web development, learning new technologies, and applying them to real-world projects. I enjoy working in teams, sharing ideas, and creating solutions that combine design, functionality, and user experience.
 I learn quickly, adapt easily, and always look for ways to improve and add value to each project. I am constantly looking for opportunities to continue growing, learn more, and leave my mark on every line of code.

experience.first-job-description:
Check network status.
Connect hardware.
Update software.
Format devices.
experience.second-job-description: I work on web development projects, collaborating with teams to solve problems and improve code quality and functionality.

hobbies.title: Video games
hobbies.description: One of my favorite pastimes is playing video games. I love the high quality and design that they offer, the diversity of themes and styles. I enjoy exploring new games and developing new ideas to increase creativity.

project.ecommerce-description-short: Ecommerce for Kripton, clothing sales website.
project.ecommerce-description-long: I created a website. Kripton requested an ecommerce platform with login and account verification to allow access to the shopping page. For this project, I used MySQL and PHP to handle queries and encrypt passwords.
project.portfolio-description-long: I built a website about myself. I created this page to showcase my skills as a developer and to let people see the projects I'm currently working on.
project.app-description-long: Iâ€™m designing a mobile app in Android Studio aimed at providing diet plans, workout routines, BMI calculation, and more features.
